distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libsoup fixes the following issues:

- A bug in the HTTP Chunked Encoding code has been fixed that could have been
  exploited by attackers to cause a stack-based buffer overflow in client or
  server code running libsoup (bsc#1052916, CVE-2017-2885).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An exploitable stack based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the GNOME libsoup 2.58. A specially crafted HTTP request can cause a stack overflow resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send a special HTTP request to the vulnerable server to trigger this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVE description
